Description: Fragment of thick wool cloth, probably from a cloak, mainly dark brown naturally pigmented with a band of brocaded decoration in pink, dark green, dark blue, dark red and undyed wool, a repeating motif of dotted lozenge with vertical bars to each side. Selvedge in contrasting dark blue weft.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Qasr Ibrim (Nubia), LC2-358-0 North-West Section Level 3 hard fill
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
